description: Indulge in the simplicity and bold flavors of Pasta Aglio e Olio, a classic Italian dish that comes together in just minutes. With garlic, olive oil, and a hint of spice, this dish is perfect for a quick weeknight dinner or a cozy gathering with friends.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water according to package instructions until al dente.
In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat and sautÃ© the minced garlic until fragrant but not browned.

With just a handful of ingredients, this dish delivers a punch of flavor that is both comforting and satisfying. The aromatic garlic and rich olive oil create a heavenly sauce that clings to each strand of spaghetti, making every bite a delight.
